values.title: George Carlin
values.desc: Thats why they call it the American Dream because you have to be asleep to believe it

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone change begins at the end of your comfort zone

values.title: Amy Tan
values.desc: We dream to give ourselves hope To stop dreaming  well thats like saying you can never change your fate

values.title: Walt Disney
values.desc: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them

values.title: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
values.desc: Youre something between a dream and a miracle

values.title: Daphne Du Maurier
values.desc: Last night I dreamt I went to Manderley again

values.title: Lewis Carroll
values.desc: Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality

values.title: Harsha Bhogle
values.desc: The moment you put a deadline on your dream it becomes a goal

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them

values.title: Neil Gaiman
values.desc: That which is dreamed can never be lost can never be undreamed

values.title: Stephanie Laurens
values.desc: My heart only ever had one thought one want One need Despite all in spite of allAll my heart has ever wanted is you

values.title: Martin Luther King Jr
values.desc: No person has the right to rain on your dreams

values.title: Victor Hugo
values.desc: There is nothing like a dream to create the future

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Dreams dont work unless you take action The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them

values.title: Gilles Deleuze
values.desc: If youre trapped in the dream of the Other youre fucked

values.title: Mary E Pearson
values.desc: It can take years to mold a dream It takes only a fraction of a second for it to be shattered

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Dream your own dreams achieve your own goals Your journey is your own and unique
